Contact Me

Getting in touch is easy!

Whether you buy books for your pleasure or to learn how to do something or just to increase your knowledge on a subject you do not fully understand, books also make great gifts. Take a special peek at any Chapter of either of my books, before your make a purchase decision. To do so just contact me through the email below and I will send you the Table of Contents of the book that interests you for you to come back to me identifying the Chapter you would like to take a 'peek' at. Enter the Name of the book in the subject of the email. You may also ask any other question through the email. Remember also that you are under no obligation to purchase the book. Neil G Van Luven - Author
